hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"Allah's Messenger (S) would pray eleven Rak'ah at night, making them off with one. When he finished them he would lay down on his right side

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَصْفِ صَلاَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِاللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Description Of The Night Prayer Of The Prophet (S)
